name: Doggo Knight (Lamonade)
description:
Introducing Doggo Knight!  A fast-paced arcade style action game!  Someone has been kidnapped and it is up to you to save her. Collect coins, avoid traps, upgrade your stats and become Doggo Knight!
  • 50 levels of Pac-man style coin collecting arcade fun 
  • Unique levels with multi terrain setting
  • Different types of mechanism and traps to keep the game fresh
  • Interesting enemies to fight and avoid
  • Upgrade your stats at the shop or fail future levels
  • Game gets progressively harder
  • Cheat available if you've tried your best...
FREE for a limited time only!
